content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generator at position(-67.5, -98.5)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at position (-67.5, -98.5)
- Boiler at position (0.5, -62.0)
- Steam engine at position (2.5, -58.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(0, -62)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at position (0, -62) and a furnace at position (4.0, -62.0)

### Copper cable factory
Consists of:
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items from inventory
- Ensure you have the required items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into entities. In this case, the agent attempted to insert coal into the furnace but had no coal available at that moment.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
